channel.title: Login Error T2 - 97,79,126 - 2,0,0 - 31,-59,
channel.description:
Edit: I have found the error! It is in my menu's for some reason they were messing up the login stuff
Ok I was editing my fr33sc4p3 server today and it was working fine untill I tried to change my pass by typing ::pass. It said my password was reset but when I logged out I couldn't log in anymore. So I deleted my character in the Character, Moreinfo, and Saved Games folder and tried to log back in. That is when I got the T2 - 97,79,126 - 2,0,0 - 31,-59, error in Moparscape. So I tried a different account and got the same thing. The same error happened in Endar so that is why I'm posting in this section not moparscape questions. Has anybody ever gotten this error before? If so, do you know how to fix it?
Thanks in advance,
Skys Shadow

item.title: Login Error T2 - 97,79,126 - 2,0,0 - 31,-59,
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

Trust me, i’ve restarted many times and I tried Endar also. And I did start a new account and I got the same thing…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 08:25:35 PM[/size][hr]I have found the error! It is in my menu’s for some reason they were messing up the login stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Login Error T2 - 97,79,126 - 2,0,0 - 31,-59,
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Because the passwords are encrypted…By doing ::pass NEWPASS it rewrited in letters instead of encrypted in #'s, you have to get the # back or start a new account

Read full topic
